chapter.title: SequenceIdGenerationService
chapter.para: Refers to a service using SEQUENCE string in DB to create new id. Setting is as the following.

row.entry: Needed when using SequenceIdGenerationService. Defines DataSourceService to link to DB.
Defines when trying to use BigDecimal type id rather than long type id.
Define SEQUENCE SQL as value. (Dependent on DB.)

listitem.para:
The following is a part of context-idgen.xml which defines the property of SuquenceIdGernerationService. SuquenceIdGernerationService gets connection object through common_datasource and uses sequence named idsequence. Therefore, to execute SuquenceIdGernerationService based on the following properties, sequence named idsequence must be created.
<bean name="SequenceIdGenerationService" class="anyframe.core.idgen.impl.SequenceIdGenerationService" destroy-method="destroy"> <property name="dataSource"> <ref bean="common_datasource"/> </property> <config:configuration big-decimals="true"> <query>SELECT NEXT VALUE FOR idsequence FROM DUAL</query> </config:configuration> </bean>
